name: Android udp util
tagline: Simple Android UDP sender and receiver, accepts Broadcast
body:
### Simple Android UDP Sender and Receive
## Send and or receive UDP datagrams over network with this simple app, to a single ip or in Broadcast.
![](http://k0nespam.tk/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/Selecci%C3%B3n_002001.jpg)
